snippet.title: Halo Wars 2: Awakening the Nightmare Launch Trailer
snippet.description: It’s the Halo experience you’ve dreamed of – control entire armies of Marines, Warthogs and Spartans on the battlefield from the Commander’s point of view. The Halo Wars 2: Complete Edition gives you an epic story taking place after the events of Halo 5 and Awakening the Nightmare – the story of Atriox’s Banished forces and their fight against the awakened Flood. Play as 16 different leaders in multiplayer or the new co-op tower defense mode – Terminus Firefight. With the power of Xbox One X, watch the action on the battlefield unfold in 4K Ultra HD with HDR. Find out more at xbox.com/halowars2
